page.title: 17SPORT IN KENDAL
page.content: Kendal has lots of sporting facilities including a leisure centre, squash courts, an 18 hole golf course, a handful of bowling greens, a putting green which has the{sole league}in the U.K., an athletics club which caters for every event except pole vault, a harness racing track which is one of the best in the country, plus a few table tennis and badminton clubs, and also a snooker club. Sport is badly attended with some clubs having financial difficulties. Some firms like the Provincial and the Westmorland Gazette{sponsor}clubs which eases financial difficulties. Netherfield Football Club had to pull out of the Northern League because of money troubles and just managed to survive. A survey showed that{30%}of children and{16%}of adults play sport in Kendal
